SummaryEnglish: Satsuki Amemiya , a member of her high school's photography club, is depressed after the graduation of her favorite club president, but with the encouragement from her best friend and another club member, Ann Kiriyama , she decides to work hard at her club activities again.
SummaryJapanese: 高校の写真部員・雨宮さつきは大好きな部長の卒業により意気消沈していたが、親友でもう1人の部員の霧山アンからの激励により、再び部活動を頑張る決心をする。

1.SummaryEnglish: Satsuki Amamiya, a member of the Photography Club, finds herself in a slump as her beloved club president graduates from high school. Her best friend, An Kiriyama, cheers her up, reigniting Satsuki's motivation to give the club her best again. But the 360-degree camera Satsuki bought at an online auction hasn't arrived yet! Satsuki and An pay the seller a visit.
1.SummaryJapanese:
高校の写真部員・雨宮さつきは、大好きな部長の卒業により意気消沈していた。
同じ写真部で親友の霧山アンの激励により、再び部活を頑張る決心をする。
その矢先、さつきがネットオークションで購入した360°カメラが届かない!?
さつきとアンは、出品者を訪ねてみることに。

2.TitleEnglish: Making of Some Aerial Photography! / Visiting a Classmate, 3000 Leagues - Motovlog Part 12
2.SummaryEnglish: Satsuki and An use a makeshift drone to try some photography when they receive notice that the photography club will be dissolved due to the lack of members. Troubled by this news, they invite fellow classmate Sakurako Shikishima from the Cinema Club, which has also received a dissolution notice. Meanwhile, Haruno is stuck on her manga draft when her high school friend, Kako Komada, pays her a visit. The two hit the road for a tour.
2.TitleJapanese: メイキング・オブ・空撮！！/クラスメイト訪ねて三千里～モトブログパート12～
2.SummaryJapanese:
疑似ドローン撮影にチャレンジしている最中、部員不足によりまさかの廃部宣告を受ける写真部。
困った２人は、同じく廃部宣告を受けたという映画研究部の同級生、敷島桜子を勧誘することに。
一方その頃、原稿に行き詰った春乃の元に高校の友人、駒田華子が訪れツーリングに出かける。

3.TitleEnglish: Right Before It Becomes an Anime!! The Manga Pilgrimage Stamp Rally With a Schedule From Hell!
3.SummaryEnglish: Haruno gets word of a manga that will be adapted into an anime. As she lives in the real-life location of that manga's story, she scouts out locations and decides to make it a focus for her manga creations. Haruno tries to carry out her plan to visit these manga pilgrimage sites on an ambitious schedule, but the other members of the Cinephoto Club can't seem to hide their unease. And so begins the hellish schedule of this location scouting tour....
3.TitleJapanese: アニメ化直前！！地獄の弾丸聖地巡礼スタンプラリー！！
3.SummaryJapanese:
とあるマンガのアニメ化を耳にした春乃。
その作品の聖地に住んでいることもあり、ロケ地を探訪しながら自身の漫画ネタにすることに。
無茶なスケジュールで聖地巡礼ツアーを決行しようとする春乃に、同行することになったシネフォト部は不安の色を隠せない。
かくして、地獄の弾丸聖地巡礼ツアーが幕を開けたのだった……。

4.TitleEnglish: A Comfy Manga Artist Goes on a Winery Tour - Motovlog Part 13 / Taking Pictures of Food and Getting Full Until We Explode
4.SummaryEnglish: Haruno invites Satsuki and the rest to join an event where they take pictures and eat while walking. The three girls happily accept, thinking it's the perfect event for the Cinephoto Club, but they find out they'll be going around shops that serve generous portions of food to the point they'll be full! They're disappointed in the food brought to them, but this is just the beginning of their fight.
4.TitleJapanese: 癒し系マンガ家ワイナリー巡り～モトブログパート13～/まんぷくフォトラリー～満腹中枢神経完全破壊～
4.SummaryJapanese:
春乃から「写真を撮りながら食べ歩きをするイベントに参加してほしい」と、依頼を受けたさつき達。
シネフォト部の活動にピッタリだと喜んで引き受けた３人だったが、なんとメガ盛りの店を巡る満腹必須のイベントだった！目の前に運ばれた料理に絶望しつつ、彼女たちの戦いは幕を開けたのだった。

5.TitleEnglish: The Story of Dry-Cured Ham in Yamanashi / A Haunted Spot and Incident of Possession
5.SummaryEnglish: The dry-cured ham that Haruno was looking forward to enjoying ended up being used as one of the recipe's ingredients! With a little convincing from Kako, the group heads out to buy some famous Yatsugatake ham instead. While on the road, they drop by abandoned places and ski areas here and there, enjoying some Kiyosato curry and visiting a variety of stores that sell ham.
5.TitleJapanese: ～生ハム山梨物語～/心霊スポット憑依事件
5.SummaryJapanese:
春乃が食べるのを楽しみにしていた生ハムが、料理の具に使われてしまった！
華子に促されて、有名な八ヶ岳ハムを買いに行くことにした一同。
道中、廃墟や夏のスキー場に寄り道したり、清里でカレーを食べたりしながら、色々なハム店を巡っていく。

6.TitleEnglish: Taking the Perfect Picture of a Maruishi Dosojin in Yamanashi! / We'll Enjoy Some Curry in Yamanashi
6.SummaryEnglish: As a story idea for Haruno's manga, the girls participate in a "maruishi" hunting event in the prefecture.
6.TitleJapanese: 山梨で完璧な丸石道祖神を激写する！/山梨でカレー、食べます
6.SummaryJapanese:
春乃の漫画ネタとして、県内に点在する丸石道祖神を探すイベントに参加することに。
どうやら専用のスマホアプリを使って、まんまる度をスキャンしていくらしい。
より丸いものを探して、山梨県内を駆け回る一同だったが……。

7.TitleEnglish: First Time for an Anime Adaptation / Calling All Manga Artists! Minobu Walker
7.SummaryEnglish: One of Haruno's manga artist friends, Isuzu, gets her work selected to be adapted into an anime! Worried about the money involved and how busy she'll be, she confides in Kurokuma and Haruno about how uneasy she feels about everything. The girls worry for Isuzu and, as a change of pace, participate in the Minobu Donburi Walk together.
7.TitleJapanese: 初めてのアニメ化/漫画家集結！身延ウォーカー
7.SummaryJapanese:
春乃の漫画家仲間、イスズの作品がアニメ化することに！
アニメ化に際して多忙になることやお金の心配など、不安なことを玄熊と春乃に相談する。
そんなイスズを気に掛け、気分転換に「身延どんぶりウォーク」に参加する一同だった。

8.TitleEnglish: Nagano/Toyama Trip That's on the Test (The First Night)
8.SummaryEnglish: Haruno and the Cinephoto Club head to Nagano for a two-night-three-day trip for a scoop. While everyone raises their hand to suggest places they want to go to, An says she wants to film some skateboarding downhill with an action camera. To do this, though, they'll need someone to ride the skateboard with her....
8.TitleJapanese: 試験に出る長野・富山の旅 第１夜
8.SummaryJapanese:
1泊2日で長野へ取材に行くことになった春乃とシネフォト部。
行きたい場所をそれぞれ挙げていく中、スケボーダウンヒルの様子をアクションカムで撮影したいと言い出すアン。
撮影には、もうひとりスケボーに乗れる人間が必要だが……。

9.TitleEnglish: Nagano/Toyama Trip That's on the Test (The Second Night)
9.SummaryEnglish: The girls meet up and head over to Kurobe Dam, where they watch a documentary about the dam's construction.
9.TitleJapanese: 試験に出る長野・富山の旅 第２夜
9.SummaryJapanese:
いち早く上高地に到着したシネフォト部と春乃。
華子も合流を目指すが、猛暑やバイクのトラブルに見舞われ散々な目に。
やっとの思いで合流した華子と一同は黒部ダムへ向かい、建設時のドキュメンタリーを見て感動しつつ、念願のダムカレーを目の前にする。

10.TitleEnglish: Nagano/Toyama Trip That's on the Test (The Third Night)
10.SummaryEnglish: It's the last day, and the group has gone all over Nagano to get this scoop. The group arrives at Togakushi, Nagano, where they try making fresh soba. They break into two teams: adults and children, and have a competition to make some soba! And finally, the group makes their last stop at a Ninja Trick Mansion, but what exactly awaits them there?
10.TitleJapanese: 試験に出る長野・富山の旅 第３夜
10.SummaryJapanese:
色々な場所を巡ってきた長野取材旅も最終日。
戸隠に到着した一同は、そば打ち体験に参加し、大人チームと子供チームに分かれてそば打ち対決を行うことに！
そして、最後に「忍者からくり屋敷」へ寄った一同だったが、そこで待ち受けていたのは……？

11.TitleEnglish: Enjoying All the Spots on the Yamanashi Shaved Ice Map
11.SummaryEnglish: There are only two days left of summer vacation. As Cinephoto Club reflects upon this past summer, they realize they haven't eaten shaved ice yet! To make this the best summer vacation without any regrets, the group takes one last trip to enjoy all the shaved ice spots listed on the Yamanashi Shaved Iced Map.
11.TitleJapanese: 山梨かき氷マップ完全制覇
11.SummaryJapanese:
夏休みも残すところあと2日。
今年の夏を振り返るシネフォト部だったが、
まだかき氷を食べていないことに気が付く……。
悔いの残らない夏休みにするため、「山梨のかき氷マップ」全制覇を目指す夏休み最後の旅に出る！

12.TitleEnglish: POV Horror - What ever shall we do?
12.SummaryEnglish: The Cinephoto Club begins shooting a horror film, though not everything is as it seems.
12.SummaryJapanese:
「映画を撮ろう！」
さつきの提案で、映画を撮影することにしたシネフォト部。
編集が楽そう？という理由でPOVモキュメンタリーにチャレンジすることに。
そこに、幽霊部員だった田島にも参加を要請するが、
撮影中にいきなり逃走してしまう……。
